attributes.review: This may be the most threatening app I have ever encountered! Not only did it take nearly 3 years to download (sketchyyyyyy), it also severely frightened me. Why do you need my phone number, Mr. Trump? I feel as if you are violating my privacy (or my rights) when all I was trying to obtain was additional information on your campaign!!!! After I hesitantly gave over my private information, I was greeted with racist, homophobic, and sexist statements coming from your behalf. As a Karen, I cannot stan this sort of dangerous activity. I demand that this app must be removed in order to keep everyone in this country safe from Trumpâ€™s extremely threatening behavior. Stay safe kids! Toodles!

attributes.review: I was shocked to see such a low rating for this app... my daughter said that the Tik-Tok teenagers are doing this!! But then I downloaded it and I have to agree with them..!!! The Official Donald Trump App is such a headache to use. I thought that my president would actually put in time and effort into making an app with so much potential, but there are no redeeming qualities. There is a horrendously ugly picture of Trump when you first open the application. There is no organization and accessing different events and news is a chore. I couldnâ€™t even press hyper-links to many tabs!!! I would not recommend this app for others... use other platforms

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: this app glitches my phone out. It started saying creepy things like â€œwhite lives matterâ€... after a week of owning it, my phone suddenly grew arms, legs, a spray tan and a MAGA hat. When this happened I decided to throw it at the bottom of the river. However, the next day when I returned home from my daily bath in the pond near my house, I found the phone running around with a knife after it had stabbed all 4 of my pets and all 3 of my family members. It then knocked me out and I woke up with my house up in flames. I quickly ran out and grabbed the possessed phone. After a while I managed to fight it off and finally deleted the wretched app.
